headline: Adobe (ADBE) Launches Firefly Mobile, Expands AI Integrations with Figma and Snap
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is the top-ranking company on the list of 10 undervalued blue chip stocks analysts recommend for smart investing. On June 17, the tech giant launched a mobile version of its AI image generation app, Adobe Firefly. The company also announced new partnerships to integrate its AI tools into other platforms. Adobe Firefly […]

headline: Calamos Phineus Long/Short Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Calamos Phineus Long/Short Fund rose 0.93% in Q1 (Class I shares at NAV), compared with a price decline of -4.27% for the S&P 500 Index and loss of -2.15% for the MSCI World Index.
